channel.title: RuneLove 718/754 *Lobby, Custom Content, 24-7, Prestiging, Highscores, IPB*
channel.description:
Server is ONLINE
We average 30+ Players daily. Even if you havn't played a RsPs. Take some time to review this thread. This is a game with an endless amount of fun.
[URL=http://runelove.com/play/][IMG]http://i.imgflip.com/19c6j.gif[/img][/URL] [url=http://www.RuneLove.Com]www.RuneLove.Com[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QdOe3.png[/img]Play Now Instantly! -> [url=http://www.RuneLove.Com/play/]WebClient[/url] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/54321053/runelove.jar]DownLoad! [/url] [url=http://runelove.com/forums/]Actively Growing Forums! [/url][url=http://runelove.com/highscores/]HighScores! [/url]
About RuneLove: At RuneLove, We strive for custom content. We are constantly adding more dialogues, quests, minigames, skills, and much more. We take all suggestions into consideration and try to make the game 100% enjoyable. Every suggestion is read and reviewed each night on the forums.
Features: -NameColoring -Quests (More added each day!) -Prestiging -30+ Minigames. -Achievements -HighScores -All Correct Bonuses/Armours -1000's of Armour Combinations -DAILY updates, Constant new content. -754 EoC Content, Old Combat, Old Specials-Curse Prayers -Perfect switching -All Spirit Shields -Imbued Rings -Clan Wars + Battles -Working Crucible -Target System -Unique Custom Content -Ingame Lobby. -CastleWars -Highly developed Content!
For the Skillers: -Money pouch -Squeal Of Fortune -Summoning,Dungeoneering, Construction 100% Trainable -25/25 Skills -Stable Economy -Completionist Cape -Sorcerer's Garden(10+ More Skilling Minigames) -Outfits shop -Loyalty Points System
For the PvM Lovers: -Queen Black Dragon -Nex -Trio Dungeoneering Boss -KalGer The WarMonger -Yk'Lagor The Thunderous -Godwars -Bork -Kalphite Queen -Soulgazer -Custom Mahjarret boss featured Quests -Fight Caves -Fight Kiln -Fight Pits -Kuradals Intense Slayer Dungeon -Corpereal Beast -King Black Dragon -Drygore, Godswords, Spirit shields, Torva, K'rils, Tokhaar Warlord. -Over 30,000 NPC's Worldwide. -Slayer Tasks -Unique Custom built hometown.
Ability to be yourself: -Over 30 Hair decorations and colors for each gender. -Over 80 Clothing apparal and colors for each gender.
Would you like to see RuneLove in action? Go to this YouTube Video. [video]http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=sDMAGxZ_RK0[/video]
Just head on over to [url=http://www.Runelove.com]www.Runelove.com[/url] and Start playing today!
Farewell, Thanks for reading!

item.title: RuneLove 718/754 *Lobby, Custom Content, 24-7, Prestiging, Highscores, IPB*
item.dc:creator: @Christina643 Christina643
item.description:
@Christina643 wrote:

[quote=“TimeRS3, post:10, topic:481745”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=599984.msg4300080#msg4300080 date=1368844138]

pack your cache a bit more properly right now lobby is glitched.

why go EOC just play runescape >.> gl though

Nah takes months to get drygore on there from scratch, Here takes days

Why would you need drygores? They were nerfed with the combat update a few weeks ago. They are only slightly better than chaotics, if not similar.
[/quote]

try but christinaa if you want those items i suggest getting kingjscape cache it’s really good has all the EOC items but your still not EOC though which makes it better.
I myself am also using it atm. some stuff though you may need to patch/[/quote]

I now pack all my own items

Read full topic

item.title: RuneLove 718/754 *Lobby, Custom Content, 24-7, Prestiging, Highscores, IPB*
item.dc:creator: @Christina643 Christina643
item.description:
@Christina643 wrote:

Server is ONLINE

We average 30+ Players daily. Even if you havn’t played a RsPs. Take some time to review this thread. This is a game with an endless amount of fun.


www.RuneLove.Com
Play Now Instantly! -> WebClient DownLoad!

Actively Growing Forums!
HighScores!

About RuneLove: At RuneLove, We strive for custom content. We are constantly adding more dialogues, quests, minigames, skills, and
much more. We take all suggestions into consideration and try to make the game 100% enjoyable. Every suggestion is read and reviewed each night on the forums.

Features:
-NameColoring -Quests (More added each day!)
-Prestiging -30+ Minigames. -Achievements -HighScores
-All Correct Bonuses/Armours -1000’s of Armour Combinations
-DAILY updates, Constant new content.
-754 EoC Content, Old Combat, Old Specials-Curse Prayers -Perfect switching
-All Spirit Shields -Imbued Rings -Clan Wars + Battles
-Working Crucible -Target System -Unique Custom Content
-Ingame Lobby. -CastleWars -Highly developed Content!

For the Skillers:
-Money pouch -Squeal Of Fortune
-Summoning,Dungeoneering, Construction 100% Trainable -25/25 Skills
-Stable Economy -Completionist Cape
-Sorcerer’s Garden(10+ More Skilling Minigames)
-Outfits shop -Loyalty Points System

For the PvM Lovers:
-Queen Black Dragon -Nex -Trio Dungeoneering Boss -KalGer The WarMonger -Yk’Lagor The Thunderous
-Godwars -Bork -Kalphite Queen -Soulgazer -Custom Mahjarret boss featured Quests
-Fight Caves -Fight Kiln -Fight Pits -Kuradals Intense Slayer Dungeon
-Corpereal Beast -King Black Dragon -Drygore, Godswords, Spirit shields, Torva, K’rils, Tokhaar Warlord.
-Over 30,000 NPC’s Worldwide. -Slayer Tasks
-Unique Custom built hometown.

Ability to be yourself:
-Over 30 Hair decorations and colors for each gender.
-Over 80 Clothing apparal and colors for each gender.

Would you like to see RuneLove in action? Go to this YouTube Video.
[video]http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=sDMAGxZ_RK0[/video]

Just head on over to www.Runelove.com and Start playing today!

Farewell, Thanks for reading!
